formattedAddress: 152 E 73rd St Suite 1 C, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 152 E 73rd St Suite 1 C, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: My children and I have been patients of Dr. Kronenberg for over 20 years. His office is immaculate and equipment up to date. He has a wonderful personality and is very intelligent. He takes time out of his busy day to address all of your concerns. He is honest and has the lightest touch. I have had many procedures done and not once regretted my decision to use his services. The office environment is very cheerful and easy going. Trust me they have been with him just as long which shows that he’s a good person to work for. He’s honest and very hard working. I have recommended him to many. The emergency call service he uses also makes sure that you as a patient with an emergency will be attended. I was even impressed on how strictly they followed COVID protocol. If I could rate him with twenty stars I would. Definitely a great investment!

originalText.text: Excellent service and care. Staff is courteous, friendly, experienced, and kind. Could not want for a better dental experience.

text.text: Excellent service and care. Staff is courteous, friendly, experienced, and kind. Could not want for a better dental experience.

originalText.text: He is the best of the best.  He’s an artist and was able to correct two of my teeth that another doctor was not able to do.

text.text: He is the best of the best.  He’s an artist and was able to correct two of my teeth that another doctor was not able to do.

originalText.text: Great experience. It’s been 20-ish years since I’ve been to the dentist but i’m happy to make more appointments. The staff is lovely, everyone explains everything and Dr Kronenberg really walks you through what’s best for you and does a great job.

text.text: Great experience. It’s been 20-ish years since I’ve been to the dentist but i’m happy to make more appointments. The staff is lovely, everyone explains everything and Dr Kronenberg really walks you through what’s best for you and does a great job.

originalText.text: Dr Kronenberg and his entire staff are the very best examples of professionalism, service and genuine kindness.

text.text: Dr Kronenberg and his entire staff are the very best examples of professionalism, service and genuine kindness.
